property.name: insert_new_user
property.value: insert into `stats_user`( `date_dimension_id`, `platform_dimension_id`, `new_install_users`, `total_install_users`, `created` ) values(?,?,?,?) on duplicate key update `new_install_users`=?

property.name: insert_browser_new_user
property.value: insert into `stats_device_browser`( `date_dimension_id`, `platform_dimension_id`, `browser_dimension_id`, `new_install_users`, `created` )values(?,?,?,?,?) on duplicate key update `new_install_users`=?
